answers.answer: Are you asking a question about Sitaglipin [Januvia] or making a statement?
i m asking as haw the use of sitaglipin help in conlrolling the sugar levels.

It is taken orally along with diet and exercise, sometimes with other medications to help lower your glucose levels. How much and when is up to your doctor, not for anyone else to say, including yourself. Use Google search to educate yourself about Januvia [Sitagliptin].
